  • java.lang.Object

    @Beta
public abstract class AbstractUAI_to_Target_Translator
extends AbstractTranslator
    Abstract base class for UAI->[some target] translations.

    oreilly

      • getSource

        public ModelLanguage getSource()
        Returns:
        the source model language for the translator.

      • getNumberOfInputs

        public int getNumberOfInputs()
        Description copied from interface: Translator
        Get the number of inputs required by the translator (usually just 1).
        Returns:
        the number of inputs required to perform the translation (e.g. a UAI input to target translation may comprise of translating the model file '.uai' and its evidence file '.uai.evid').

      • getInputFileExtensions

        public java.lang.String[] getInputFileExtensions()
        Description copied from interface: Translator
        Used if the translator's inputs are to be read from a file. NOTE: the first input file extension is to always be the main model file, others are considered supporting.
        Returns:
        the unique file extensions to use for each input (# file extensions must = number of inputs).
